body:
* Replace Subtraction solid with Union solid whenever appropriate
* Reduce subtracted Box size
* Re-parent: place Pb volumes in Al layer

Final shape does not change:
![screenshot 2016-11-11 16 22 53](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1390682/20263175/cba71fe8-aa65-11e6-9985-1b2f28ec383b.png)

Final description does not change, though more optimization with less Union solids could be done:
![screenshot 2016-11-14 12 21 33](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1390682/20263203/da1b8f28-aa65-11e6-8866-1f39ee9a43d5.png)
